com.google.android.agera

Class Conditions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.agera.Conditions

  • public final class Conditions
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility methods for obtaining Condition instances.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Condition all(Condition... conditions)
      Returns a Condition that evaluates to true if all of the given conditions evaluates to true.
      static Condition any(Condition... conditions)
      Returns a Condition that evaluates to true if any of the given conditions evaluates to true.
      static Condition falseCondition()
      Returns a Condition that always returns false.
      static Condition not(Condition condition)
      Returns a Condition that negates the given condition.
      static <T> Condition predicateAsCondition(Predicate<T> predicate, Supplier<? extends T> supplier)
      Returns a Condition from a Predicate and a Supplier.
      static Condition staticCondition(boolean value)
      Returns a Condition that always returns value.
      static Condition trueCondition()
      Returns a Condition that always returns true.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • trueCondition

        public static Condition trueCondition()
        Returns a Condition that always returns true.

      • falseCondition

        public static Condition falseCondition()
        Returns a Condition that always returns false.

      • staticCondition

        public static Condition staticCondition(boolean value)
        Returns a Condition that always returns value.

      • not

        public static Condition not(Condition condition)
        Returns a Condition that negates the given condition.

      • any

        public static Condition any(Condition... conditions)
        Returns a Condition that evaluates to true if any of the given conditions evaluates to true. If conditions is empty, the returned Condition will always evaluate to false.

      • all

        public static Condition all(Condition... conditions)
        Returns a Condition that evaluates to true if all of the given conditions evaluates to true. If conditions is empty, the returned Condition will always evaluate to true.

      • predicateAsCondition

        public static <T> Condition predicateAsCondition(Predicate<T> predicate,
                                                 Supplier<? extends T> supplier)
        Returns a Condition from a Predicate and a Supplier.

        When applied the Supplier return value will be provided to the Predicate and the result will be returned. If Predicates.truePredicate() or Predicates.falsePredicate() is passed, supplier will never be called.
